verbose_text: Furthermore, the cytoprotective autophagy is related to ubiquitin mediated degradation of Hsp90 and subsequent dephosphorylation of its client protein Akt, leading to inactivation of the Akt / mTOR pathway and activation of the cytoprotective autophagy.
evidence: ubiquitin-mediated degradation of Hsp90 and subsequent dephosphorylation of its client protein Akt
